00052 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_MIN_H
00053 #define CONSTRAINT_MIN_H
00054 
00055 template<typename VarArray, typename MinVarRef>
00056 struct MinConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00057 {
00058   virtual string constraint_name()
00059   { return "Min"; }
00060   
00061   //typedef BoolLessSumConstraint<VarArray, VarSum,1-VarToCount> NegConstraintType;
00062   typedef typename VarArray::value_type ArrayVarRef;
00063   
00064   VarArray var_array;
00065   MinVarRef min_var;
00066   
00067   MinConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array, const MinVarRef& _min_var) :
00068     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var_array(_var_array), min_var(_min_var)
00069   { }
00070   
00071   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00072   {
00073     triggerCollection t;
00074     
00075     for(int i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00076     { // Have to add 1 else the 0th element will be lost.
00077       t.push_back(make_trigger(var_array[i], Trigger(this, i + 1), LowerBound));
00078       t.push_back(make_trigger(var_array[i], Trigger(this, -(i + 1)), UpperBound));
00079     }
00080     t.push_back(make_trigger(min_var, Trigger(this, var_array.size() + 1 ),LowerBound));
00081     t.push_back(make_trigger(min_var, Trigger(this, -((int)var_array.size() + 1) ),UpperBound));
00082     
00083     return t;
00084   }
00085   
00086   //  virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00087   
00088   virtual void propagate(int prop_val, DomainDelta)
00089   {
00090     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(Min);
00091     if(prop_val > 0)
00092     {// Lower Bound Changed
00093 
00094     //Had to add 1 to fix "0th array" problem.
00095       --prop_val;
00096 
00097       if(prop_val == (int)(var_array.size()))  
00098       {
00099         DomainInt new_min = min_var.getMin();
00100         typename VarArray::iterator end = var_array.end();
00101         for(typename VarArray::iterator it = var_array.begin(); it < end; ++it)
00102           (*it).setMin(new_min);
00103       }
00104       else
00105       {
00106         typename VarArray::iterator it = var_array.begin();
00107         typename VarArray::iterator end = var_array.end();
00108         DomainInt min = it->getMin();
00109         ++it;
00110         for(; it < end; ++it)
00111         {
00112           DomainInt it_min = it->getMin();
00113           if(it_min < min)
00114             min = it_min;
00115         }
00116         min_var.setMin(min);
00117       }
00118     }
00119     else
00120     {// Upper Bound Changed
00121       // See above for reason behind "-1".
00122       prop_val = -prop_val - 1;
00123       if(prop_val == (int)(var_array.size()))
00124       {
00125         typename VarArray::iterator it = var_array.begin();
00126         DomainInt minvar_max = min_var.getMax();
00127         while(it != var_array.end() && (*it).getMin() > minvar_max)
00128           ++it;
00129         if(it == var_array.end())
00130         {
00131           getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00132           return;
00133         }
00134         // Possibly this variable is the only one that can be the minimum
00135         typename VarArray::iterator it_copy(it);
00136         ++it;
00137         while(it != var_array.end() && (*it).getMin() > minvar_max)
00138           ++it;
00139         if(it != var_array.end())
00140         { // No, another variable can be the minimum
00141           return;
00142         }
00143         it_copy->setMax(minvar_max);
00144       }
00145       else
00146       {
00147         min_var.setMax(var_array[prop_val].getMax());
00148       }
00149     }
00150 
00151   }
00152   
00153     
00154   virtual void full_propagate()
00155   {
00156     int array_size = var_array.size();
00157     if(array_size == 0)
00158     {
00159       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00160     }
00161     else
00162     {
00163       for(int i = 1;i <= array_size + 1; ++i)
00164       {
00165         propagate(i,0);
00166         propagate(-i,0);
00167       }
00168     }
00169   }
00170   
00171   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00172   {
00173     D_ASSERT(v_size == var_array.size() + 1);
00174     if(v_size == 1)
00175       return false;
00176       
00177     DomainInt min_val = big_constant;
00178     for(int i = 0;i < v_size - 1;i++)
00179       min_val = min(min_val, v[i]);
00180     return min_val == *(v + v_size - 1);
00181   }
00182 
00183   // Bah: This could be much better!
00184   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00185   {
00186     for(int i = min_var.getMin(); i <= min_var.getMax(); ++i)
00187     {
00188       if(min_var.inDomain(i))
00189       {
00190         bool flag_domain = false;
00191         for(int j = 0; j < var_array.size(); ++j)
00192         {
00193           if(var_array[j].inDomain(i))
00194           {
00195             flag_domain = true;
00196             assignment.push_back(make_pair(j, i));
00197           }
00198           else
00199           {
00200             if(var_array[j].getMax() < i)
00201             {
00202               return false;
00203             }
00204             if(var_array[j].getInitialMin() < i)
00205               assignment.push_back(make_pair(j, var_array[j].getMax()));
00206           }
00207         }
00208       
00209         if(flag_domain)
00210         {
00211           assignment.push_back(make_pair(var_array.size(), i));
00212           return true;
00213         }
00214         else
00215           assignment.clear();
00216       }
00217     }
00218     return false;
00219   }
00220   
00221   // Function to make it reifiable in the lousiest way.
00222   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00223   {
00224       vector<AnyVarRef> t;
00225       for(int i=0; i<var_array.size(); i++)
00226           t.push_back(var_array[i]);
00227       t.push_back(min_var);
00228       
00229       return new CheckAssignConstraint<vector<AnyVarRef>, MinConstraint>(stateObj, t, *this);
00230   }
00231 
00232   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00233   {
00234     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00235     vars.reserve(var_array.size() + 1);
00236     for(unsigned i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00237       vars.push_back(AnyVarRef(var_array[i]));
00238     vars.push_back(AnyVarRef(min_var));
00239     return vars;
00240   }
00241 };
00242 
00243 template<typename VarArray, typename VarRef>
00244 AbstractConstraint*
00245 BuildCT_MIN(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array, const vector<VarRef>& _var_ref, ConstraintBlob&)
00246 { return (new MinConstraint<VarArray,VarRef>(stateObj, _var_array, _var_ref[0])); }
00247 
00248 template<typename VarArray, typename VarRef>
00249 AbstractConstraint*
00250 BuildCT_MAX(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array, const vector<VarRef>& _var_ref, ConstraintBlob&)
00251 { return (new MinConstraint<typename NegType<VarArray>::type, typename NegType<VarRef>::type>(stateObj,
00252                                                                                               VarNegRef(_var_array),
00253                                                                                               VarNegRef(_var_ref[0]))); 
00254 }

00256 #endif
